name: Fort Sam
description:
Fort Sam is a puzzle-oriented point and click game where you play as Sam, a boy who can't seem to fall asleep. Your goal is to piece together the clues, solve the puzzles and collect all the necessary items in each room of the house so that Sam's can finally build a comfortable pillow fort.

Sit back and enjoy the cozy and relaxing atmosphere as you interact with the world around you. Make your way through the house and meet fun and lovable characters along the way.

Features:

  • A playful and nostalgic experience
  • Quirky, animated characters
  • Care free puzzle solving
  • Cozy hand drawn art
